channel.title: Bad couple weeks
channel.description:
I'm not really sure where to post this but I really just want to get my thoughts out, no one say that I don't have friends because I'm posting this here etc.. because I'm just trying to vent and I have told a lot of my friends already.
Well basically the last two weeks have been hell for me and the people around me. First of all I found out that I might have been moving away from here and all my friends and family, I told my girlfriend at the time which lead to events which ultimately ended up with her and I breaking up. Then she kept inviting me over and calling me and stuff then she would tell me to leave her alone and I would then she would call me and it would be a cycle over and over again. Then one night she told her mom to make me leave and said how I wouldn't leave her alone which is total bullshit. Her mom then went and applied to get a fucking restraining order against me. So I'm like fine whatever. The night before they went she had called me saying how much she missed me and wanted to be with me still and that she wanted to be by me in school before all of this happened. I said fine whatever and then I went to bed. Then my alarm clock didnt go off and I didn't end up going to school. She called me later last night and told me that she had went with her mom and that it would be a four year restraining order, I got pissed and asked her on what grounds and she started playing dumb. My mom then took me over to her house to get my stuff and to return her stuff to her. My mom told her that she(my exgf) had been contacting me and that there was no grounds for a restraining order. Then we left and I've been trying to get over her and what not but I've been hurting bad, so that's one of my problems.
Then yesterday my brothers friend came over, and hes practically my adopted brother, her told me to wake up my brother because it was an emergancy. I don't really want to go into detail for his sake but he was having problems with his wife and she wanted to take their kid back to Canada where she used to live. So now I start worring about him.
Then today I went out with my friends to try to get my mind off of this shit and have a good time and get really fucked up. So I go and then about three or four hours ago we got a call from my cousins friends. I found out that my cousins mom died from cancer and that he had been drinking all day and tried to kill himself. So we went over there to make sure he was okay and try to help him out. He and I never really got along and in fact got into many fights, but familys family. So I went over there and he was drunk and pissed off and started cussing me and my friend out and then finally I told him that even though we haven't got along in the past that I'm there for him and then he give me a couple hugs and told me he didn't know what to do. So I started to worry about him.
So I lost the girl I love, My practically adopted brother is fighting with who he loves and might not see his kid for a while, and my cousin tried to kill himself. I was trying to keep clean and I feel guilty because I went out and snorted two addys, drank god knows how much, and smoked a few bowls and blunts.
I don't expect anyone to feel bad for me but I just wanted to get this off my chest. Thank you for reading this.

item.title: Bad couple weeks
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath.v2 Aftermath.v2
item.description:
@Aftermath.v2 wrote:

We’re all rooting for you for some dumb reason. Nothing like gossip on the interwebs.

When internet drama plays out in a public form or, more commonly, the accuser's head, resulting in declaration of internet guilt of they accused. Usually the accused is riding the lollercoaster and their friends bait and troll the insane person. Occasionally, some faggots will speak up in support of the accuser. These people are frequently furries or plushies, with the occasional voraphile. The reason for this has yet to be determined. Several notable cases have resulted in internet restraining orders.
When you are pwned by an internet lawyer, you are found internet guilty and must go directly to internet jail. Do not pass internet go, do not collect 200 e-dollars.

Read full topic

item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

pookey71:

Wow I hade to put a restraning order onto my EX girlfriend.Man 20 emails a day.Phone calls at all times of the day and night.People adding me on msn and 20 of those where just to talk to me.So i called the police and charged her with harrasment and conspricary of assult and battery (she hired a “Hitman”)Now if she does anything to make contact with me i can charge her.So my life is sweet and also she is gothic and emo(I’m not i’d like it if we didn’t talk about her)

Lol, thats sounds harsh. Stuff like that is why I never have dated a goth/emo, I mainly stick to preps :)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 27, 2006, 05:42:26 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Aftermath.v2, post:40, topic:16029”]Yay, she talked to you. Now call her back on a land line and tell her that your cell died. Things are looking up.

pookey, lol.[/quote]
No my house phone died so I told DJ to have her call me back in 30 mins

item.description:

[quote=“therealjdb, post:32, topic:16029”]No need to turn this into a hostile topic. If you don’t have something nice to say please keep it to yourself. I realise everyone has problems and I like to help out where I can, even if it means just listening, so instead of flaming someone just try to listen and understand them or just don’t post.

@wall of fir I think coatbridge was just joking around no need to take it so bad and say stfu.

It’s all about karma(not forum karma) when bad things happen good things will eventually happen to make everything xen. You do something good for/to someone someway something good will happen to you, you do something bad it will find it’s way back too you.[/quote]
Yin and yang.
